name: Gentzkow Shapiro Lab (GSLab)
body:
### People

[Matthew Gentzkow](http://faculty.chicagobooth.edu/matthew.gentzkow/)  
Richard O. Ryan Professor of Economics and Neubauer Family Faculty Fellow   
University of Chicago Booth School of Business

[Jesse Shapiro](http://www.brown.edu/Research/Shapiro/)  
George S. and Nancy B. Parker Professor of Economics   
Brown University

###### Current Research Professionals

Jiwon Choi, 2014-present  
BA Economics, Brown University, 2014

Zongjin Qian, 2013-present  
BS Physics & Mathematics, Duke University, 2013

Michael B. Wong, 2013-present  
BA Physics, Harvard University, 2013

Allen T. Zhang, 2013-present  
BA Economics & Statistics, University of Chicago, 2013

### Past Members

[Michael Sinkinson](https://bepp.wharton.upenn.edu/profile/21190/), lab member 2006-2007  
Assistant Professor of Business Economics and Public Policy, The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania, 2012-present.     
PhD Business Economics, Harvard University, 2012; B.Com Commerce, Queenâ€™s University, 2004
